entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as one of the new Gryffindor prefects. He is described as looking rather startled at Moody's view of him.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a character who is glaring at Ron with his normal eye. He is mentioned to be an authority figure.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as one of the people that Ron moved away from.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as one of the people that Ron moved away from.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the person who appointed Ron to withstand most major jinxes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as one of the new Gryffindor prefects.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is introduced as a character who suggests a toast to Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as being in a good mood.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is introduced as someone who has come with Mr. Weasley and his family.

relationships.description: Moody glares at Ron with his normal eye.
Dumbledore appointed Ron to withstand most major jinxes.
Mr. Weasley suggests a toast to Ron and Hermione.
Mr. Weasley suggests a toast to Ron and Hermione.
